comment._content:
boy its my birthtown..it looks so peacefull back then..now such busy area with traffic:(
Who is the photographer?
thanks!

comment.author: 35075914@N06
comment._content: Detroit Publishing Company did not keep records of photographers. They probably got their images from a wide variety of sources. RobKuijper, you can see the original record in our online catalog at www.loc.gov/pictures/item/2001699505 , where you can link to more info about Detroit Publishing and photochroms.
